#include<iostream>

#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

   int t,i,dot[10]={0,1,2,3,4,5,4,3,2,1},count;

   char code[10][10]={"-----",".----","..---","...--","....-",".....","-....","--...","---..","----."},str[11];

   scanf("%d",&t);

   /// we cannot initialise/define the string as above

   /*
   code[0]="-----";
   code[1]=".----";
   code[2]="..---";
   code[3]="...--";
   code[4]="....-";
   code[5]=".....";
   code[6]="-....";
   code[7]="--...";
   code[8]="---..";
   code[9]="----.";

   */

   while(t--)
   {

     cin>>str;

     count=0;

     for(i=0;str[i]!='\0';i++)
     {

         printf("%s",code[str[i]-'0']);

         count=count+dot[str[i]-'0'];

     }

     printf("\n%d\n",count);

   }

   return 0;

}
